description:
I ran a stress test twice on nova with an absurd timeout (github.com/klmitch/backfire, ./run_tests.py --stress --timeout=30 to replicate).  Both times, it went through about 4 or 5 rounds of creating and deleting 500 instances, then nova-api actually crashed:

root@xxx1:~# ps auwwwx | grep nova
nova      4975  0.4  2.1 160328 88048 ?        S    Jul07  55:20 /usr/bin/python /usr/bin/nova-scheduler --flagfile=/etc/nova/nova.conf
nova      5030  0.6  1.9 152036 79944 ?        S    Jul07  72:20 /usr/bin/python /usr/bin/nova-network --flagfile=/etc/nova/nova.conf
nova     19816  0.0  0.7  83156 30716 ?        S    Jul14   0:00 /usr/bin/python /usr/bin/nova-api --flagfile=/etc/nova/nova.conf
nova     19823  0.0  0.7  83504 28672 ?        S    Jul14   0:00 /usr/bin/python /usr/bin/nova-api --flagfile=/etc/nova/nova.conf
nova     19824  5.3  0.0      0     0 ?        Z    Jul14  53:33 [python] <defunct>
root     21278  0.0  0.0   7544   820 pts/1    S+   15:00   0:00 grep nova

(Process 19824 was a running nova-api.)

When I checked the log files, I found the following message:

2011-07-14 23:52:15,717 CRITICAL nova [-] [Errno 5] Input/output error
(nova): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/bin/nova-api", line 56, in <module>
(nova): TRACE:     sys.exit(main())
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/bin/nova-api", line 47, in main
(nova): TRACE:     launcher.launch_service(osapi)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/service.py", line 94, in launch_service
(nova): TRACE:     process.start()
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/multiprocessing/process.py", line 104, in start
(nova): TRACE:     self._popen = Popen(self)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/multiprocessing/forking.py", line 99, in __init__
(nova): TRACE:     code = process_obj._bootstrap()
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/multiprocessing/process.py", line 248, in _bootstrap
(nova): TRACE:     sys.stderr.write('Process %s:\n' % self.name)
(nova): TRACE: IOError: [Errno 5] Input/output error
(nova): TRACE: 

Nova version, as reported by nova-manage: 2011.3-dev (2011.3-trunk:tarmac-20110707183602-bsbcyh8qquejeba9)
title: nova-api crash running stress test
